Detailed Description

BtCancelableMulticastRequest is a child class of BtCancelableRequest and implements the common properties for requests that realize multi device communication and that can be interrupted. Any further concrete requests that address more than one and not all devices in its range and that can be canceled are not directly derived from BtRequest. Instead of this they should be child classes of BtCancelableMulticastRequest.
See BtRequest for a complete description of Bluetooth requests.

void BtCancelableMulticastRequest::SetDeviceList (  const BtDeviceList &  device_list  ) 
 

Set target of this request.

SetDevice sets the target this request should be associated with. This request copies the passed in device to avoid dangling pointers when the request lives and the associated device description is destroyed.

Parameters:
device A reference to a BtDevice that should be the target this request should be associated with.
